name: youtube-downloader-desktop
description: Desktop application for YouTube video downloading with GUI

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run build:main:watch" "npm run build:renderer:watch" "wait-on dist/main/main/main.js && rsync -av resources/yt-* dist/resources/ && chmod +x dist/resources/yt-* && electron ."
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer && rsync -av resources/yt-* dist/resources/ && chmod +x resources/yt-* && chmod +x dist/resources/yt-*
scripts.pack:mac: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false CSC_FORCE_SIGN=false npm run build && electron-builder --mac --dir
scripts.pack:mac:x64: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false CSC_FORCE_SIGN=false npm run build && electron-builder --mac --x64 --dir
scripts.pack:mac:arm64: DEBUG=electron-builder CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false CSC_FORCE_SIGN=false npm run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64 --dir
scripts.dist:win:both: npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis portable
scripts.dist:win:all: npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64 -c.win.target=portable && electron-builder --win --x64 -c.win.target=nsis && electron-builder --win --arm64 -c.win.target=portable && electron-builder --win --arm64 -c.win.target=nsis
scripts.dist:mac: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false CSC_FORCE_SIGN=false npm run build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.dist:mac:x64: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false CSC_FORCE_SIGN=false npm run build && electron-builder --mac --x64
scripts.dist:mac:arm64: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false CSC_FORCE_SIGN=false npm run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.dist:mac:dmg: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false CSC_FORCE_SIGN=false npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg
scripts.dist:mac:zip: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false CSC_FORCE_SIGN=false npm run build && electron-builder --mac zip
scripts.dist:mac:both: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false CSC_FORCE_SIGN=false npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip
scripts.dist:mac:all: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false CSC_FORCE_SIGN=false npm run build && electron-builder --mac --x64 --arm64
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run dist:win:both
scripts.build:prod:all: npm run build && npm run dist:win:all
scripts.test:build: npm run build && echo 'Build completed successfully'

author: YouTube Downloader Team
